title: Drawing, "Decorative Studies of Candelabra; Verso: Masculine Heads", 1817
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor over graphite on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Eleven decorative studies of candelabra with grotesques; two capitals. Verso: masculine head with laurel wreath in profile, barbarian head in profile after antique.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Studies of Candelabra; Verso: Masculine Heads", 1817.
1817. Pen and ink, brush and watercolor over graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2374.
